endpoints.description: Retrieve current status of allocated resources across leisure facilities.
Submit resource allocation updates for leisure facilities.
Fetch aggregated data of customer behavior for analysis.
Obtain predictions for seasonal demand shifts in facility usage.
Retrieve the list and details of all managed leisure facilities.
Update specific configurations for a leisure facility by ID.
Access historical optimization reports to assess past performance.
Submit feedback to refine resource optimization models.
View summarized key metrics for operation management in a dashboard.
Clear cached predictive data to initialize recalculation.
